sentence.text: Here we show that response to radiation, a Mediator subunit in the Middle module of Mediator complex, is overexpressed in breast cancer and is a negative prognostic factor.

response to radiation mediates induction of cell proliferation and migration and the genes associated with it (transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, VEGF, MMP1, and signal transduction) in breast cancer, which is abrogated when used together with protein polyubiquitination-191-inhibition.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Overall, the results show that response to radiation/ER-a/protein polyubiquitination-191 axis promotes breast cancer cell proliferation and migration and may serve as a novel target for therapy
